ygData.subject: Re: More advice please.
ygData.msgSnippet: ... I agree... these spells do have their uses, though I haven t noticed a real large decrease in damage from the endure spells....  However, while they do
ygData.messageBody:
> Hmm.. I have found the endure (and resist line at higher levels) to be
> very useful.. I rarely go anywhere without at least endure magic up..
> endure Fire is very useful in Lavastorm.. endure cold in permafrost..
> and poison/disease in befallen/unrest.. they each have their uses and it
> cuts down on your healing quite a bit..

> As for cancel magic.. try using it as a debuff.. drop a MOB's fire

I agree... these spells do have their uses, though I haven't noticed a real large decrease in damage from the endure spells.... However, while they do have their moments I still rank their importance far beneath the heal, bind, smite, and dismiss undead spells... If you have the money, by all means buy them all.. i bought them all and I'm not trying to discourage anybody from buying the spells. However, if you are short cash... I would put those spells last on the priority list.

Eachann Bronzeleaf,
Cleric of Tunare, Tarew Marr
